# TASK::TASK_STOP_PHONE_GESTURE_ANIMATION

## Parameters
* **PED_INDEX** ped
* **FLOAT** blendOutOverride = -1:
Overrides the blend out time set in TASK_PLAY_PHONE_GESTURE_ANIMATION.
Will use the originally set blend out time if left at -1.0.

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Stops a player phone animation
